io.permazen.core.type

Class ShortArrayType

  • java.lang.Object

            • io.permazen.core.type.IntegralArrayType<short[],Short>
              • io.permazen.core.type.ShortArrayType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparator<short[]>

    public class ShortArrayType
extends IntegralArrayType<short[],Short>
    short[] primitive array type. Does not support null arrays.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
